# General Documentation Templates

General-purpose templates for common documentation needs.

## Available Templates

- [Meeting Notes Template](./meeting-notes-template.md) - For documenting meetings
- [How-To Guide Template](./how-to-guide-template.md) - For step-by-step instructions
- [FAQ Template](./faq-template.md) - For frequently asked questions
- [Process Documentation Template](./process-template.md) - For documenting processes
- [Onboarding Guide Template](./onboarding-template.md) - For new team member onboarding

## Usage Guidelines

### When to Use Each Template

- **Meeting Notes**: For team meetings, standups, retrospectives, and planning sessions
- **How-To Guide**: For instructional content that teaches a specific task
- **FAQ**: For common questions and answers
- **Process Documentation**: For documenting workflows and procedures
- **Onboarding Guide**: For helping new team members get started

### General Best Practices

- Keep documentation clear and concise
- Use consistent formatting
- Include examples where helpful
- Update documentation regularly
- Make it searchable and accessible
